entry.title: Sunday: Snow at times heavy. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this morning then snow at times heavy. Risk of freezing rain late this morning. Snowfall amount 10 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h this morning. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 16 this morning and minus 8 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM CDT Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy ending overnight then mainly cloudy. Local blowing snow late this evening and overnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 5:00 AM CDT Sunday 2 April 2023
